attributes.action: introduce nutrition to the national curriculum to promote healthy eating and a proactive attitude towards personal health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is fact that the body needs a good balance of nutrients to remain healthy. If children could learn at an early age to eat healthily, and how important nutrients are to the body, they would be healthier in the long run.  In theory,    this would encourage people to be more proactive about their health and not rely on the NHS to react to their illnesses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
